name: mayakwd.github.io
body:
## repos

### [as3-insecure-image-load](https://github.com/mayakwd/as3-insecure-image-load)
As you know (or not?), you can't manipulate BitmapData of loaded image, without getting permissions from crossdomain.xml. As usual you have no rights to change its content, so how to get BitmapData in that case?

Example of crossdomain, where permissions granted only for subdomains: [crossdomain.xml](https://vk.com/crossdomain.xml)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
